email_chain.subject: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Carlos,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have the vessel OCEAN WAVE (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 250m) available for your shipment of 10,000MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Houston on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 85/MT. Laycan is 25-30 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Elena Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Elena,

Thank you for the quote. USD 85/MT seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Can you offer a better rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and the loading window?

Best regards,
Carlos Ruiz
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

I can offer a reduced rate of USD 82/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. The loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Elena,

USD 82/MT is better, but we are looking for something closer to USD 80/MT. Can you adjust the rate further? Also, can we extend the laycan to 27-31 October?

Best regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

I can agree to USD 80/MT with the extended laycan of 27-31 October. Please confirm if this works for you, and I will proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Elena

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Elena,

USD 80/MT and the extended laycan of 27-31 October work for us. Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Great! I have attached the charter party for your review. Please let me know if any adjustments are needed.

Best regards,
Elena
